message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CE, cs.SY, cs.GT 

The paper proposes a contextual-bandit approach for demand side management, which involves modeling the mean consumption as a function of contextual variables such as temperature and weather. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper involves optimization of price incentives, which could fall under the control engineering (cs.CE) and systems and control (cs.SY) sub-categories. Finally, the paper also discusses regret bounds and performance metrics, which could be relevant to the game theory (cs.GT) sub-category.
